Keywords: Amazon , Bombshells , Justice League , Justice Society , Past , Warrior
Real Name: Diana
Special Powers
CHAMPION OF THEMYSCIRA: WONDER WOMAN'S BRACELETS: Wonder Woman may start the game with any Wonder Woman Equipment equipped. // If Wonder Woman is equipped with WW80 #s005 Wonder Woman's Bracelets, when she is targeted by a range attack increase the result of her Super Senses roll by an additional +1.
SHE CAN DO IT!: Friendly characters with "Woman" or "Girl" in their name -or- have the Bombshells keyword, can't be given action tokens by opposing effects or have their combat values negatively modified by opposing effects.
